Module flag4j
Package org.flag4j.arrays.dense

Class FieldVector<T extends Field<T>>

java.lang.Object
org.flag4j.arrays.backend.AbstractTensor<FieldVector<T>,Field<T>[],T>
org.flag4j.arrays.backend.TensorOverSemiRing<FieldVector<T>,FieldVector<T>,Field<T>[],T>

org.flag4j.arrays.backend.DenseFieldVectorBase<FieldVector<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,CooFieldVector<T>,T>
org.flag4j.arrays.dense.FieldVector<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the field element for the vector.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, DenseTensorMixin<FieldVector<T>,CooFieldVector<T>>, DenseVectorMixin<FieldVector<T>,CooFieldVector<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,Field<T>[],T>, TensorBinaryOpsMixin<FieldVector<T>,FieldVector<T>>, TensorMixin<FieldVector<T>,Field<T>[],T>, VectorMatrixOpsMixin<FieldVector<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,FieldMatrix<T>>, VectorMixinOld<FieldVector<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,Field<T>[],T>
public class FieldVector<T extends Field<T>> extends DenseFieldVectorBase<FieldVector<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,CooFieldVector<T>,T>

A dense vector whose entries are field elements.

Vectors are 1D tensors (i.e. rank 1 tensor).

FieldVectors have mutable entries but a fixed size.

See Also:
